Definition & Scope.quote: AI is the science of making machines act in ways that would be called intelligent if done by humans. (John McCarthy)

Turing Test.quote: Can machines think? Imitation Game: If a machine fools 30% of judges in 5min, it passes. (Alan Turing, 1950)
